doc:
Jack Bannon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Bannon 0 John James Bannon (June 14, 1940 – October 25, 2017) was an American television and stage actor, known as Jack Bannon. He was best known for his role as Art Donovan on Lou Grant, a role he played for the duration of the series, from 1977 to 1982. John_James_Bannon ( June_14_,_1940 – October_25_,_2017 ) was an_American_television_and_stage_actor , known as Jack_Bannon . He was_best_known for his_role as Art_Donovan on Lou_Grant , a_role he played for the_duration of the_series , from 1977 to 1982 .
